sub_topic: Identification of unknown compounds using mass spectrometry
message_1: Identify the unknown compound in a given sample using mass spectrometry and provide its chemical formula, molecular weight, and possible functional groups present in the compound.
message_2: As an AI language model, I cannot directly analyze a physical sample or perform mass spectrometry. However, if you provide me with the mass spectrometry data or the molecular weight and fragmentation pattern, I can help you interpret the data and identify the compound.
